name: griddle-react-bootstrap-examples
description: Example for Bootstrap pagination for griddle-react

scripts.dev: htmlprocessor src/index.html -o public/index.html -c process -s -e development && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack -v -w
scripts.build: htmlprocessor src/index.html -o dist/index.html -c process -s -e production && usemin dist/index.html -d dist -o dist/index.html && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack -p

author: Hiroyuki Wada
